click_the_icon: Click the Ara icon to get started
transcription_too_short: The transcript is too short. Must be at least 500 characters.
microphone_access: Give Ara access to your microphone
microphone_access_description: Ara needs access to your microphone to transcribe your voice
mistakes: Ara can make mistakes. Check important info.
pin_to_toolbar: Pin the Ara Extension to your toolbar

playground.demo_only: This playground is for demo purposes only.
playground.welcome: Welcome to the Ara Playground. Click the start button to begin a new transcription.
playground.demo_version: This is a demo version of the Ara browser extension, which integrates with your EHR system.
